code: import memoize from'lodash/memoize';export var easeIn=function easeIn(x){return Math.pow(x,2);};export var easeOut=function easeOut(x){return 1-easeIn(1-x);};export var easeInOut=function easeInOut(x){if(x<0.5){return easeIn(x*2)/2;}else{return 0.5+easeOut((x-0.5)*2)/2;}};var pageUrl=function pageUrl(page,pages){return pages[page]||null;};var boundingRight=function boundingRight(displayedPages,viewWidth,xMargin,rightPage,maxX,pages){if(displayedPages===1){return viewWidth-xMargin;}else{var x=pageUrl(rightPage,pages)?viewWidth-xMargin:viewWidth/2;return x>maxX?x:maxX;}};var boundingLeft=function boundingLeft(displayedPages,viewWidth,xMargin,leftPage,minX,pages){if(displayedPages===1){return xMargin;}else{var x=pageUrl(leftPage,pages)?xMargin:viewWidth/2;return x<minX?x:minX;}};var pageWidth=function pageWidth(imageWidth,pageScale){return Math.round(imageWidth*pageScale);};var pageHeight=function pageHeight(imageHeight,pageScale){return Math.round(imageHeight*pageScale);};var xMargin=function xMargin(viewWidth,pageWidth,displayedPages){console.log('xMargin',viewWidth,pageWidth,displayedPages);return(viewWidth-pageWidth*displayedPages)/2;};var yMargin=function yMargin(viewHeight,pageHeight){return(viewHeight-pageHeight)/2;};var centerOffsetSmoothed=function centerOffsetSmoothed(currentCenterOffset){return Math.round(currentCenterOffset);};export var _pageUrl=memoize(pageUrl);export var _boundingRight=memoize(boundingRight);export var _boundingLeft=memoize(boundingLeft);export var _pageWidth=memoize(pageWidth);export var _pageHeight=memoize(pageHeight);export var _xMargin=memoize(xMargin);export var _yMargin=memoize(yMargin);export var _centerOffsetSmoothed=memoize(centerOffsetSmoothed);
